Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: robinsbe
Reviews.Content: I always like the package deals that amazon provide in there sales and I couldn't pass this one up because of the 24-70mm f/2.8  lenes with the CF cards sold me on the deal the camera bag and cleaning things was just the cherry on the top.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 8 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D800 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 24-70mm f/2.8G AF-S Lens +
<3> Transcend 32GB 133x (CF) Card + <4> Additional Transcend 32GB 133x (CF) Card +
<5> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <6> Nikon 3pc Lens Cleaning Kit +
<7> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower + <8> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D800 Digital SLR Camera Body with 24-70mm f/2.8G AF-S ED Lens + (2) 32GB Cards + Case + Accessory Kit
